mapper.insert: insert into order_message(patient_ID, dept,detail_time , num_sequence, order_date, user_id, number_id, status) values (#{patientID}, #{dept}, #{detailTime}, #{numSequence}, #{orderDate}, #{userId}, #{numberId}, #{status})
mapper.update: update order_message set status = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from order_message where patient_ID = #{account} and detail_time like '%${numberDate}%'
